subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The new N.B.A. commissioner, Adam Silver, and the fans are best in position to punish Donald Sterling, should the racist comments on a tape recorder prove to be from the Clippers’ owner.
snippet: The new N.B.A. commissioner, Adam Silver, and the fans are best in position to punish Donald Sterling, should the racist comments on a tape recorder prove to be from the Clippers’ owner.
